attributes.action: BBC Licence fee and F1 coverage
attributes.additional_details:
Free to Air Sports rights

In light ot today's announcement about F1 coverage from 2012 I wish to ask the Government why we licence payers are now being asked to pay BSkyB (Murdoch) when we are all individually struggling to survive after the dreadful economic chaos caused by the greed of the financial community and the hold they held over our (supposed) politicians.

We can not afford to go out, we can not afford to go on holiday, we can not afford to drive for a day so make us pay a second time to watch some sport at home.

Pathetic
